roundabout.translation[0].definitions[0]: a raised circular area where three or more roads join together and which cars must drive around
Turn left at the first roundabout.
roundabout.translation[0].definitions[1]: a round structure for children to play on in a park. Children sit on it while someone pushes it around and around.
roundabout.translation[1].definitions[0]: a roundabout way of saying something is not clear, direct, or simple
It was a roundabout way of telling us to leave.
roundabout.translation[1].definitions[1]: a roundabout way of getting somewhere is longer and more complicated than necessary
The bus took a very long and roundabout route.
